title: More Winners Series
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
description: A second series of highly acclaimed television programs for children. 'Winners' and 'More Winners' are anthology series of fourteen telemovies, featuring historical drama, comedy, science fiction, fantasy, adventure and social realism. Each film celebrates individuality and the facing of difficult situations with courage and ingenuity.
